specialTipSize.specialTip: Utilize the Abnormality to fortify an E.G.O Weapon. This will consume a small amount of the facility’s currently collected energy.
The fortified weapon will have higher Attack Power.
However, there is a possibility of losing the E.G.O during the fortification process.
The fortified weapon will lose the Abnormality’s power after the day has passed.
